description:
Flashing colored lights is a great way for Dot to show off and have fun.  
Let's help Dot put on a light show!

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically turn the lights off.

hints.description: Drag out a Lights Off state. Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning off the lights, make Dot automatically turn on green lights.
puzzles.introduction: Now let's help Dot brighten things up!

hints.description: Drag out a Green light. Link the light with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on green lights, make Dot automatically turn the lights off again.
puzzles.introduction: Now let's add another link to make the light blink!

hints.description: Make a loop! Link the Green light back to the Lights Off state using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: Change the Lights Off state into a Magenta light.
puzzles.introduction:
Blinking one color is a cool thing to do.  
Let's see what happens when we try to blink two!

hints.description: Replace the Lights Off state by dragging the Magenta light on top of it.

puzzles.description: Make Dot automatically blink three lights in this order: magenta then green then yellow.
puzzles.introduction:
Those two colors have a really nice glow!  
Let's keep the party going and add a third to the show!

hints.description: Drag the last Auto cue between the Magenta and Green lights to the trash.
Make a loop! Drag out a Yellow light and link it with Auto cues between the Green and Magenta lights.
